control_attributes.Control: CP-2 (4) RESUME ALL MISSIONS / BUSINESS FUNCTIONS
control_attributes.control_description: The organization plans for the resumption of all missions and business functions within [Assignment: organization-defined time period] of contingency plan activation.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization coordinates contingency plan testing with organizational elements responsible for related plans.
